sys_ws_operation.name: requestStatus

sys_update_version.name: sys_ws_operation_f2c753c1db0f85100cd34408059619e4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>a5e36d86dbc349100cd344080596193f</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>requestStatus</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var body = request.body.data;
    type = body.type;
    requestId = body.requestId;
	gs.info("Got response from Alert server  ==>" + JSON.stringify(body));
    var grAuditLog = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_alertsnowp_audit_log');
    if (grAuditLog.get('ae_request_number', requestId)) {
       // gs.info("Got response from Alert server  ==>" + JSON.stringify(body));
        var tableName = "";
        if (type == "RequestNewBadge") {
            tableName = "x_aleen_alertsnowp_new_badge";
        } else if (type == "PhysicalAccess") {
            tableName = "x_aleen_alertsnowp_building_access";
        } else if (type == "RequestNewMobileCredetials") {
            tableName = "x_aleen_alertsnowp_mobile_credential";
        } else if (type == "replacementBadge") {
            tableName = "x_aleen_alertsnowp_repalce_badge";
        }
        if (tableName != "") {
            var grs = new GlideRecordSecure(tableName);
            if (grs.get('number', grAuditLog.request_no)) {
                grs.state = 3;
                grs.update();
                var includeScript = new AlertEnterprisePlatformAPIs();
                includeScript.saveAuditLog(grs.number, "System", "Request is provisioned", requestId, " SUCCESS");
            }
        }
    }
    return {
        "success": true
    };
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_aleen_alertsnowp/alertapiinboundrequest/requeststatus</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/requeststatus</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 17:09:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f2c753c1db0f85100cd34408059619e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestStatus</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Workplace Access and Security" source="x_aleen_alertsnowp">87fbe6c21b7e41108dcc755e034bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Workplace Access and Security">87fbe6c21b7e41108dcc755e034bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f2c753c1db0f85100cd34408059619e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-09 09:35:55</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="AlertAPIInboundRequest">c9479b81db0f85100cd34408059619e2</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
